name: Weight Loss Program
shortDescription: Maintaining your weight, three or four days of strength training like weight lifting, squats, lunges, push ups, etc. in week.

name: Gym Training Session
shortDescription: To exercise safely, effectively with a lot of fun. With accountability and a lot of support will be provided. Special training for your big day.

name: Personal home training
shortDescription: If you feel uncomfortable in gym center with a lot of people, then. It's personal home training program for you as with your comfort.

name: Online training Session
shortDescription: Live virtual personal training for you as your comfortness. Each session will help you to get your goals. No need of gym of equipment.
